metadata.synopsis: The quasit is a summon that has information about the Thayan cellar. She's alittle shithead who loves nothing more than cutting people up and being an arsehole.

5.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
5.text: Did your brain hole forget, beefy? Balsam for wounds. Power is king. Go. Go.

16.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
16.text: Argh. Shit-piddling toe-rag. Never summon Shovel. Never feed Shovel. Now call Shovel?!

258.speaker: Narrator
258.text: *You recognise the tiny fiend - a quasit. Wicked creatures often used as familiars.*

25.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
25.text: Eh? What is you? Why you smell like that?
25.context: NodeContext: cocked head, big sniff after 'eh'? curious

13.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
13.text: You... you smell of magic. Magic of thunder and pain...
13.context: NodeContext: starting to freak out - shovel really doesn't like the magic she smells in the player.

73.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
73.text: ...No magic, please! Is good servant. Very good!
73.context: NodeContext: More quiet and cowardly than shovel has ever sounded. She's afraid of the player. Crouched down and afraid

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Make a grand gesture, as if preparing a spell.

217.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
217.text: Ah! AHHH. NO. BAD MAGIC. SORRY. SORRRRY.
217.context: NodeContext: FREAKING OUT. Cowering, bent down and terrified.

34.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
34.text: Wait. Wait. Warn you! About the book! Master Illy loves the book. Horny for it!
34.context: NodeContext: start of line cowering, then straightens up eager and servile - shovel is trying to talk her way out of the situation

156.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
156.text: Tell you secret! Not the others, but master, yes, tell Thunder Master!
156.context: NodeContext: start of line cowering and then straightens up, eager and servile

204.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
204.text: The mirror hides. Hides the special thing. Tell it balsam good for wounds. Tell it!

193.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
193.text: A book. Master Illy horny for the book. Book this, book that. Never finished book.

164.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
164.text: No! No. Truth. Only truth. Mirror hides the book. Book makes people eat fingers. Like sausages. Crunch, crunch!

101.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
101.text: But Thunder Master can read it. Can conquer it! Yes!

239.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
239.text: But Thunder Master can read it. Can conquer it! Yes!

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Someone went to a lot of trouble to guard this place.

168.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
168.text: Master Illy. Urgh. Big, stupid scaredy cat. Hides here with magic book. Book doesn't like Master Illy.
168.context: NodeContext: utter disdain at the mention of shovel's old master

259.speaker: Player
259.text: I won't hurt you, don't worry.

251.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
251.context: NodeContext: Shovel is surprised and grateful, coming out of crouch - amazed she won't be beaten

62.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
62.text: Eh? Old master. Boring master. Doesn't call in a long, long time. Maybe dead. Maybe not.
62.context: NodeContext: Comes out of a crouch at 'eh'. realising she's not about to be beaten. Big shrug the end. Very much a 'i don't care'.

228.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
228.text: Thunder Master is nice. Doesn't hit Basket, so Basket tells you.

32.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
32.text: Thunder Master is nice. Doesn't hit Fork, so Fork tells you.

9.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
9.text: Thunder Master is nice. Doesn't hit Shovel, so Shovel tells you.

7.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
7.text: Be careful of the book. Master Illy is horny for the book, but book is not horny for him.
7.context: NodeContext: said very sagely - this is shovel trying to give good advice

50.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
50.text: Thunder Master smells scary but is nice. Doesn't hit Basket. Tell you secret. Only you.
50.context: NodeContext: said very sagely - this is shovel trying to give good advice

227.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
227.text: Thunder Master smells scary but is nice. Doesn't hit Fork. Tell you secret. Only you.
227.context: NodeContext: said very sagely - this is shovel trying to give good advice

131.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
131.text: Thunder Master smells scary but is nice. Doesn't hit Shovel. Tell you secret. Only you.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Considering your stench, you can't really judge.

220.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
220.text: Stench? No. Smell like piss and blood - nice things.
220.context: NodeContext: sincere - these are delicious smells to shovel

215.speaker: Player
215.text: You could just ask what race I am.

30.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
30.text: No, not your beef slab! Inside. Master Illy is death and silk. Your magic is thunder and pain. Don't - don't like it...
30.context: NodeContext: Getting riled up. Shovel is freaked out by the player being a sorcerer

236.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
236.text: Wait. You smell funny. Like - like fire and iron. Like a dragon.
236.context: NodeContext: Big sniff after 'wait'. Absolute wonder in shovel's voice at being a dragon. She LOVES dragons.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I am a dragon. But don't tell anyone.

257.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
257.context: NodeContext: Like a kid seeing their favourite superhero in real life. Absolute wonder and joy.

8.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
8.text: Basket loves dragons! Big flappy bastards. But Master Illy said Basket can't be a dragon. Prick.

130.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
130.text: Teach Basket how to be a dragon! Then, Basket tells you a secret. A big secret.

84.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
84.text: Fork loves dragons! Big flappy bastards. But Master Illy said Fork can't be a dragon. Prick.

64.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
64.text: Teach Fork how to be a dragon! Then, Fork tells you a secret. A big secret.

196.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
196.text: Shovel loves dragons! Big flappy bastards. But Master Illy said Shovel can't be a dragon. Prick.

261.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
261.text: Teach Shovel how to be a dragon! Then, Shovel tells you a secret. A big secret.

268.speaker: Player
268.text: Sure. Just hold your arms out real wide.

161.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
161.text: DRAGON BASKET IS GONNA EAT YOUR BABIES.
161.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flaps her arms joyfullyNodeContext: Vicious delight, laughing loudly and maniacally at the beginning

89.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
89.text: Master Illy. Loved book. But book nearly. Killed him. Careful!
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: On every full stop, shovel jumps as she flaps her armsNodeContext: On every full stop, shovel jumps as she flaps her arms. Excited and joyful

63.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
63.text: Tell mirror. Balsam good. For wounds.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: On every full stop, shovel jumps as she flaps her armsNodeContext: On every full stop, shovel jumps as she flaps her arms. Excited and joyful

152.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
152.text: DRAGON FORK IS GONNA EAT YOUR BABIES.
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flaps her arms joyfullyNodeContext: Vicious delight, laughing loudly and maniacally at the beginning

254.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
254.text: DRAGON SHOVEL IS GONNA EAT YOUR BABIES.
254.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flaps her arms joyfullyNodeContext: Vicious delight, laughing loudly and maniacally at the beginning

129.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
129.context: NodeContext: Arms held out wide - super excited

141.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
141.context: NodeContext: Arms are held out at the start of the line - drop them as if embarassed. sAD AND FRUSTRATED

213.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
213.text: Hope book eats your stupid face.
213.context: NodeContext: Shovel says this bitterly, like a chastised child with a comeback

188.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
188.text: Tell the stupid mirror about balsam. Good for burns. GO ON.

75.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
75.context: NodeContext: like a shitty spoilt kid begging

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I lied. I'm not a dragon.

67.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
67.context: NodeContext: pouting, stamping foot, edge of a tantum

124.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
124.text: Guess you're boring. Not like Master Illy.

172.speaker: Player
172.text: I also have marks - I'm a descendant of dragons.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: There's dragon blood in me, but that's all I know.

202.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
202.text: So a fake dragon? Urgh. Boring. Master Illy is fun.

232.speaker: Player
232.text: Considering your stench, you can't judge.

28.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
28.text: What's them funny scales? Is you... is you a dragon?

229.speaker: Player
229.text: 'Funny'? Says the creature that looks and smells like half-dead vermin.

135.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
135.context: NodeContext: pleased - this was a compliment to shovel

142.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
142.text: My master. Tall. Skinny. Prick with ears.

241.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
241.text: So. You're Basket's master now? Fine.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: You're a disgusting little creature, aren't you?

223.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
223.text: Heh. And you. Slab of beef with nipples. Moo.

212.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
212.text: Master Illy calls me Shovel. Don't like it? Change it.
212.context: CinematicNodeContext: stick a finger in your ear and smell itNodeContext: Said with a shrug as you stick a finger in your ear and smell it

72.speaker: Player
72.text: What would you like to be called?

102.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
102.text: So. What first, master? Gutting locals? Raising the dead? Making them walk? Making them scream?

235.speaker: Player
235.text: No. And you'll not commit such deeds in my name either.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Is that what you and your old master did here?

270.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
270.text: Yes. Steal bodies. Tear them. Then Illy puts them back together. Again. And again.

56.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
56.text: When he wasn't horny for the book. Urgh. Book this. Book that. He loves the book.

237.speaker: Player
237.text: Hmm. Some light pillage - perhaps a bit of murder to follow?

78.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
78.text: Yes! Master is fun! More fun than Illy.

3.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
3.text: Urgh. Forks. Make the feast slow. Less tearing. Less blood. But fine. I am Fork.

249.speaker: Player
249.text: Does Basket sound good to you?

105.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
105.text: Basket. I like. Baskets hold babies. My favourite.

133.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
133.text: Yeah. Illy named me. Your friend, the arse-wipe, said it was fine.
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: stick a finger in your ear and smell itNodeContext: Said with a shrug as you stick a finger in your ear and smell it

61.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: stick a finger in your ear and smell itNodeContext: Said with a shrug as you stick a finger in your ear and smell it

38.speaker: Player
38.text: This Illy you mentioned - who's that?

158.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
158.text: Master Illy. Wonderful. He tricks them. 'Heals' them. HAH. Then they die. So sudden. So mysterious.

273.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
273.text: Shovel comes. Shovel takes them. Then we raise them. Make them walk. Necromancer, your kind call him.

58.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
58.text: Urgh. You don't like gutting? Spilling? Tearing? Boring.

51.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
51.text: Wait. Are you horny? For the book? Illy never shuts up. Book this. Book that. BLEH.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: I can't wait to dig into it.

103.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
103.text: Urgh. You and Illy same. Best buddies. Bunk buddies. Gross.

121.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
121.text: One time Illy reads it. Eats his fingers like sausages. Heh. Boney sausages. Crunch crunch crunch.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Yes - I found the book. Quite the read.

165.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
165.text: Huh. Didn't fry your tiny brain hole? Damn.

137.speaker: Player
137.text: Is that what the mirror hides?

211.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
211.text: And more. Illy horny for many things.

94.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
94.text: Oh! Ohhhh. Master should go see.

85.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
85.text: Illy weak. Illy never finish book. But master? Master can do it. Read book. Conquer book. Yes.

250.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
250.text: Talk to the mirror. And remember. Balsam? Good for burns.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: You have such a way with words.

203.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
203.text: Heh. Good with tongue. Good at cutting them out, too. Tell you secret?

118.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
118.text: Yes. Love when they cry. Love when they bleed. Delicious.

174.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
174.text: Illy so busy. Only cares about the book. Book this. Book that. Urgh.

65.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
65.text: So. You're Fork's master now? Fine.

97.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
97.text: So. You're Shovel's master now? Fine.

149.speaker: Player
149.text: Ugh. What chewed you up and spat you out?

198.speaker: Player
198.text: Your scroll was in an undead's casket. Who were they?

244.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
244.text: The blacksmith. The teacher. The grocer. The baker. Little piggies to the butcher.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *The stench of sulphur fills your nose.*

19.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
19.text: Bwahaha! Smell like steak. Yum. Yum.

195.speaker: Player
195.text: You filthy creature - you told me balsam was for burns.

178.speaker: Player
178.text: Why are you laughing? You could have died too.

269.speaker: Player
269.text: The truth now, wretch - or I'll gut you.

47.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
47.text: Good. Basket likes having more holes.

49.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
49.text: Good. Fork likes having more holes.

23.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
23.text: Good. Shovel likes having more holes.

143.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
143.text: Now. Truth. Balsam for wounds. Power is king. Always.

219.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
219.text: Believe. Don't believe. Basket doesn't care.

116.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
116.text: Believe. Don't believe. Fork doesn't care.

234.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
234.text: Believe. Don't believe. Shovel doesn't care.

266.speaker: Player
266.text: What does that last part even mean?

173.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
173.text: Urgh. That new master is stupid.

175.speaker: Player
175.text: Just get out of my sight. We're done.

26.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
26.text: Urgh. Another bandy-legged gobshite. What do you want with Shovel?

218.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
218.text: Yeah. The other arse-wipe said it was fine.
218.context: NodeContext: irreverant shrug, completely oblivious to the fact that she's just insulted both the player and the other party member

31.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
31.text: Urgh. Another bandy-legged gobshite. What do you want with Basket?

52.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
52.text: Basket is bored. Basket wants to MURDERISE.
52.context: NodeContext: dramatic, over the top, all she wants to do is kill

91.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
91.text: Oh, oh, a spell shite! When the fisting starts, use the sparky magic to call Basket. LET'S KILL EVERYTHING.
91.context: NodeContext: excited, wants to be in battle

100.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
100.text: Shovel told master! Tells no one but master!

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I know, I know. I'll get it right this time.

253.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
253.text: Master better. Balsam for wounds and power is king. No forget!
253.context: NodeContext: frustrated - shovel thinks she's stuck with a stupid master

276.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
276.context: NodeContext: rolling her eyes, bored out of her tree - all she wants to do is kill

179.speaker: Player
179.text: I look forward to fighting with you.

93.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
93.text: YAY. ALL THE KILLING, FIGHTING, AND FISTING!
93.context: NodeContext: loud, delighted, bloodthirsty and happy

192.speaker: Player
192.text: Speak to me with respect, you petulant little fiend.

231.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
231.context: NodeContext: Rolling eyes at player (who demanded respect) irreverant, dismmissive

170.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
170.context: NodeContext: surprised as her tirade has been interrupted, but also rude as hell

108.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
108.context: NodeContext: rolling her eyes at the player's politeness, thinks they're a boring shite

148.speaker: Player
148.text: I'm asking the questions here - who're you?

255.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
255.text: You got jam in your holes? SHOVEL. Don't like it? Change it.
255.context: NodeContext: Pointing at her ears, being chaotic and belligerent

160.speaker: Player
160.text: What would you like to be called?

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Does Basket sound good to you?

181.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
181.text: So, you're Basket's master now? Fine. I like gutting. Killing. Tearing. Smearing. And dancing on dead kiddies.
181.context: NodeContext: getting more excited as she goes through the list, being chaotic and belligerent

59.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
59.text: Call me when the fisting starts. Oh, and DON'T BE A BORING SHITE.
59.context: NodeContext: nearly roaring at the end - all she wants to do is kill

21.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
21.text: Master wants me to cut up piggies? Only a magical shite can call me. Grab one, and I'll teach 'em the spell. It's nasty - like me!
21.context: NodeContext: nearly roaring at the end - all she wants to do is kill

226.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
226.text: So, you're Fork's master now? I like gutting. Killing. Tearing. Smearing. And dancing on dead kiddies.
226.context: NodeContext: getting more excited as she goes through the list, being chaotic and belligerent

163.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
163.text: So, you're Shovel's master now? Fine. I likes gutting. Killing. Tearing. Smearing. And dancing on dead kiddies.
163.context: NodeContext: getting more excited as she goes through the list, being chaotic and belligerent

166.speaker: Player
166.text: What chewed you up and spat you out?

95.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
95.text: Last nippled meatslab called me Shovel. Don't like it? Change it.
95.context: NodeContext: she's been summoned many times- this is routine for her now. Being belligerent and

134.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
134.text: Go on. Talk to mirror. Balsam good for wounds.

139.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
139.text: Master made sparky mad! Master is stupid!

153.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
153.text: Book waiting. Waiting for new master. Better master. Read book. Go on.

177.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
177.text: Oh, oh, a spell shite! When the fisting starts, use the sparky magic to call Shovel. LET'S KILL EVERYTHING.
177.context: NodeContext: excited, wants to be in battle

186.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
186.text: Urgh. Another bandy-legged gobshite. What do you want with Fork?

191.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
191.text: Book didn't melt your eye goobers. Oh well. Next time.

210.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
210.text: Shovel is bored. Shovel wants to MURDERISE.
210.context: NodeContext: dramatic, over the top, all she wants to do is kill

216.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
216.text: Oh, oh, a spell shite! When the fisting starts, use the sparky magic to call Fork. LET'S KILL EVERYTHING.
216.context: NodeContext: excited, wants to be in battle

230.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
230.text: Bodies to gut. Babies to eat! Let's go, beefy.

240.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
240.text: Haha! Run. Run! Or sparky gets you.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Enough! How do I disarm the trap?

35.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
35.text: Sit on it and call it daddy. It's a fire. How do you think you stop it?

207.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
207.text: Or run squealing. Sparky gets tired. Eventually.

256.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
256.text: See. Tell you truth, beefy. Trust me. Always always.
256.context: InternalNodeContext: Spoke to mirror and let in

271.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
271.text: Fork is bored. Fork wants to MURDERISE.
271.context: NodeContext: dramatic, over the top, all she wants to do is kill

169.speaker: Player
169.text: There will be plenty of killing soon.

221.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
221.context: NodeContext: throwing head back, loud, over the top, dramatic

68.speaker: Player
68.text: There is more to life than murder.

128.speaker: GROUP_Act1_FOR_QuasitSummon
128.text: Yes! Like setting things on fire.
